main.name: Steffan Crowe
main.description: with over 10 years' experience developing performance-critical software, architecting cloud solutions, and leading engineering teams.
main.bio: I am a Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years’ experience building robust, scalable applications using C#, .NET, and modern frameworks. I’ve led engineering teams, managed large-scale infrastructure upgrades, and delivered projects across industrial automation, cloud, and blockchain. My work spans ASP.NET Core APIs, trading automation, and advanced backend optimization, with a focus on clean architecture and real business impact.
main.contactmessage: If you wish to get in touch, please send me an email at steffan.crowe@hotmail.co.uk

resume.skillmessage: Please download my CV for a more detailed summary of my skills.

education.description: For my dissertation I created a 3D physics engine covering collision detection, rotational and gravitational forces, implementing physics laws and custom algorithms for 3D environments.

work.title: Engineering Supervisor / Software Engineer
work.description: Led and mentored an engineering team while delivering full-stack applications using C#, .NET, React Native, and GitHub Actions. Oversaw key infrastructure upgrades, including migration to Git and CI/CD pipelines. Developed and optimized software used globally to configure and monitor industrial controllers. Implemented advanced features such as PLC editors, cross-platform Mono solutions, and Python-based automated testing frameworks.

work.title: Crypto Trading Platform Developer
work.description: Built a high-performance automated cryptocurrency trading platform using ASP.NET (.NET 8), ASP.NET Core Web API, BigQuery, and a custom Solana RPC node. Designed REST APIs (with Swagger), implemented data pipelines, real-time trading strategies, and genetic algorithm-based strategy optimization. Integrated secure remote configuration, monitoring, and manual execution endpoints.

work.title: CRM Developer (JavaScript)
work.description: Designed and delivered a custom CRM web application for a multi-site car dealership. Integrated advanced features using JavaScript and Google Maps API, enabling tracking of sales, holiday management, commission calculation, and delivery pricing. Developed dynamic dashboards and reports to drive business decisions.

work.title: Video Associate
work.description: Created and processed video advertisements. Solved customer queries over email and phone, demonstrating strong communication and technical problem-solving skills.

projects.title: Crypto Trading Platform
projects.category: Automated trading, data engineering, and blockchain
